text: Moosa ke pichey uski qaum ke logon ne apne zewaron (ornaments) se ek bachde (calf) ka putla bana liya jis mein se bail (cow) ki si awaaz nikalti thi. Kya unhein nazar na aata tha ke woh na unsey bolta hai na kisi maamle mein unki rehnumayi karta hai? Magar phir bhi unhon ne usey mabood bana liya aur woh sakht zalim thay
